content: the scallop tank top is summer in a top the light cotton yarn combined with the breezy drape and scallop edging remind me of long beach days basking under the golden new zealand sun the top is made entirely of single crochets so it s perfect for mindless crocheting while you listen to waves crashing on the beach as a road trip project or while watching tv the scallop stitch edge and tie straps add a feminine touch to the sleek silhouette but there are options for plain straight straps and you can easily leave off the scallops for a simple v-neck tank top sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl skill level easy check out more free crochet patterns ** here 1 ** sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
